snippet: It may seem disloyal to your team, but most buyers would prefer seeing a clean, uncluttered, neutral space.
abstract: Market Ready Q&A answers question about removing sports memorabilia before showing a home to potential buyers.
lead_paragraph: It may seem disloyal to your team, but most buyers would prefer seeing a clean, uncluttered, neutral space.

headline.print_headline: Should I Remove Sports Memorabilia Before Showing My Home?
headline.main: Should I Remove Sports Memorabilia Before Showing My Home?
